<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Utility class for extracting code into a new function.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// This utility provides a simple interface for extracting some sequence of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// code into its own function, replacing it with a call to that function. It</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// also provides various methods to query about the nature and result of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// such a transformation.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// The rough algorithm used is:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// 1) Find both the inputs and outputs for the extracted region.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// 2) Pass the inputs as arguments, remapping them within the extracted</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///    function to arguments.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// 3) Add allocas for any scalar outputs, adding all of the outputs&#39; allocas</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///    as arguments, and inserting stores to the arguments for any scalars.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/codeextractor"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/codeextractor/#a152c260d40a85ed5b0ef5f11f86ac3b4">CodeExtractor</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">using </span><span class="doxyHighlight">ValueSet = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/setvector">SetVector&lt;Value &#42;&gt;</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Various bits of state computed on construction.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dominatortree">DominatorTree</a> &#42;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> DT;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> AggregateArgs;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/blockfrequencyinfo">BlockFrequencyInfo</a> &#42;BFI;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/branchprobabilityinfo">BranchProbabilityInfo</a> &#42;BPI;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/assumptioncache">AssumptionCache</a> &#42;AC;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// A block outside of the extraction set where any intermediate</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// allocations will be placed inside. If this is null, allocations</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// will be placed in the entry block of the function.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;AllocationBlock;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If true, varargs functions can be extracted.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> AllowVarArgs;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Bits of intermediate state computed at various phases of extraction.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/setvector">SetVector&lt;BasicBlock &#42;&gt;</a> Blocks;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// Lists of blocks that are branched from the code region to be extracted,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// also called the exit blocks. Each block is contained at most once. Its</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// order defines the return value of the extracted function.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// When there is just one (or no) exit block, the return value is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// irrelevant.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// When there are exactly two exit blocks, the extracted function returns a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// boolean. For ExtractedFuncRetVals&#91;0&#93;, it returns &#39;true&#39;. For</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// ExtractedFuncRetVals&#91;1&#93; it returns &#39;false&#39;.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// NOTE: Since a boolean is represented by i1, ExtractedFuncRetVals&#91;0&#93;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    ///       returns 1 and ExtractedFuncRetVals&#91;1&#93; returns 0, which opposite</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    ///       of the regular pattern below.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// When there are 3 or more exit blocks, leaving the extracted function via</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// the first block it returns 0 When leaving via the second entry it</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// returns 1, etc.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;BasicBlock &#42;&gt;</a> ExtractedFuncRetVals;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Suffix to use when creating extracted function (appended to the original</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// function name + &quot;.&quot;). If empty, the default is to use the entry block</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// label, if non-empty, otherwise &quot;extracted&quot;.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><span class="doxyHighlight">    std::string Suffix;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If true, the outlined function has aggregate argument in zero address</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// space.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ArgsInZeroAddressSpace;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">public</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// Create a code extractor for a sequence of blocks.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// Given a sequence of basic blocks where the first block in the sequence</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// dominates the rest, prepare a code extractor object for pulling this</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// sequence out into its new function. When a DominatorTree is also given,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// extra checking and transformations are enabled. If AllowVarArgs is true,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// vararg functions can be extracted. This is safe, if all vararg handling</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// code is extracted, including vastart. If AllowAlloca is true, then</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// extraction of blocks containing alloca instructions would be possible,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// however code extractor won&#39;t validate whether extraction is legal.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// Any new allocations will be placed in the AllocationBlock, unless</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// it is null, in which case it will be placed in the entry block of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// the function from which the code is being extracted.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// If ArgsInZeroAddressSpace param is set to true, then the aggregate</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// param pointer of the outlined function is declared in zero address</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// space.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/codeextractor/#a152c260d40a85ed5b0ef5f11f86ac3b4">CodeExtractor</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;BasicBlock &#42;&gt;</a> BBs, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dominatortree">DominatorTree</a> &#42;DT = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><span class="doxyHighlight">                  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> AggregateArgs = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/blockfrequencyinfo">BlockFrequencyInfo</a> &#42;BFI = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><span class="doxyHighlight">                  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/branchprobabilityinfo">BranchProbabilityInfo</a> &#42;BPI = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><span class="doxyHighlight">                  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/assumptioncache">AssumptionCache</a> &#42;AC = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> AllowVarArgs = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><span class="doxyHighlight">                  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> AllowAlloca = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><span class="doxyHighlight">                  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;AllocationBlock = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><span class="doxyHighlight">                  std::string Suffix = </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ArgsInZeroAddressSpace = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// Perform the extraction, returning the new function.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// Returns zero when called on a CodeExtractor instance where isEligible</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// returns false.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/codeextractor/#a8561c48aa0b397c37f9e071dad7df392">extractCodeRegion</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/codeextractoranalysiscache">CodeExtractorAnalysisCache</a> &amp;CEAC);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// Perform the extraction, returning the new function and providing an</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// interface to see what was categorized as inputs and outputs.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// \\param CEAC - Cache to speed up operations for the CodeExtractor when</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// hoisting, and extracting lifetime values and assumes.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// \\param Inputs &#91;out&#93; - filled with  values marked as inputs to the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// newly outlined function.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">     /// \\param Outputs &#91;out&#93; - filled with values marked as outputs to the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// newly outlined function.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// \\returns zero when called on a CodeExtractor instance where isEligible</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/codeextractor/#a8561c48aa0b397c37f9e071dad7df392">extractCodeRegion</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/codeextractoranalysiscache">CodeExtractorAnalysisCache</a> &amp;CEAC,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// Verify that assumption cache isn&#39;t stale after a region is extracted.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// Returns true when verifier finds errors. AssumptionCache is passed as</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// Test whether this code extractor is eligible.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// Based on the blocks used when constructing the code extractor,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// determine whether it is eligible for extraction.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// Checks that varargs handling (with vastart and vaend) is only done in</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/codeextractor/#ad3a4770e725305d3529cba8c6562c85a">isEligible</a>() </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// Compute the set of input values and output values for the code.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// These can be used either when performing the extraction or to evaluate</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// the expected size of a call to the extracted function. Note that this</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// work cannot be cached between the two as once we decide to extract</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// a code sequence, that sequence is modified, including changing these</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// sets, before extraction occurs. These modifications won&#39;t have any</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// significant impact on the cost however.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="203"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/codeextractor/#ab4d4236fd0a481a0d93e159a9882fc53">findInputsOutputs</a>(ValueSet &amp;Inputs, ValueSet &amp;Outputs,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="214"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="215"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// Find the set of allocas whose life ranges are contained within the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="216"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// outlined region.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="217"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="218"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// Allocas which have life&#95;time markers contained in the outlined region</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="219"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// should be pushed to the outlined function. The address bitcasts that</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="226"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="227"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// Find or create a block within the outline region for placing hoisted</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="229"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="230"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// CommonExitBlock is block outside the outline region. It is the common</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="231"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// successor of blocks inside the region. If there exists a single block</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="232"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// inside the region that is the predecessor of CommonExitBlock, that block</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="233"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// will be returned. Otherwise CommonExitBlock will be split and the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="234"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// original block will be added to the outline region.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00281" /><CodeLine lineNumber="281"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                           </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ValueSet &amp;outputs,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00282" /><CodeLine lineNumber="282"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                           <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/blockfrequency">BlockFrequency</a> EntryFreq,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00284" /><CodeLine lineNumber="284"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                           ValueSet &amp;StructValues,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00286" /><CodeLine lineNumber="286"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00287" /><CodeLine lineNumber="287"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// Generates the code for the extracted function. That is: a prolog, the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00288" /><CodeLine lineNumber="288"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// moved or copied code from the original function, and epilogs for each</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00289" /><CodeLine lineNumber="289"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// exit.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00290" /><CodeLine lineNumber="290"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> emitFunctionBody(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ValueSet &amp;inputs, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ValueSet &amp;outputs,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00291" /><CodeLine lineNumber="291"><span class="doxyHighlight">                          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ValueSet &amp;StructValues, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> &#42;newFunction,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00292" /><CodeLine lineNumber="292"><span class="doxyHighlight">                          <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/structtype">StructType</a> &#42;StructArgTy, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;header,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00293" /><CodeLine lineNumber="293"><span class="doxyHighlight">                          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ValueSet &amp;SinkingCands);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00294" /><CodeLine lineNumber="294"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00295" /><CodeLine lineNumber="295"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// Generates a Basic Block that calls the extracted function.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00296" /><CodeLine lineNumber="296"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/callinst">CallInst</a> &#42;emitReplacerCall(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ValueSet &amp;inputs, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ValueSet &amp;outputs,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00302" /><CodeLine lineNumber="302"><span class="doxyHighlight">                               std::vector&lt;Value &#42;&gt; &amp;Reloads);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00303" /><CodeLine lineNumber="303"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00304" /><CodeLine lineNumber="304"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// Connects the basic block containing the call to the extracted function</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00305" /><CodeLine lineNumber="305"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// into the original function&#39;s control flow.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00306" /><CodeLine lineNumber="306"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> insertReplacerCall(</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00308" /><CodeLine lineNumber="308"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ValueSet &amp;outputs, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;Value &#42;&gt;</a> Reloads,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00309" /><CodeLine lineNumber="309"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemap">DenseMap&lt;BasicBlock &#42;, BlockFrequency&gt;</a> &amp;ExitWeights);</span></CodeLine>
